edu.asu.ying.mapreduce.events

Interface EventHandler<TEventArgs extends EventArgs>

  • Type Parameters:
    TEventArgs - the type extending EventArgs which contains contextual information about the Event.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ValueChangedEventHandler<T>

    public interface EventHandler<TEventArgs extends EventArgs>
    The interface defining a callback method to which events can pass EventArgs when they are fired.
